name: Stremio Server
description: Stremio's streaming server allows you to stream movies, TV shows, web channels, sports, and more. This is the backend server component that enables streaming functionality across all Stremio clients. With support for various streaming protocols and content sources through its addon system, Stremio Server provides a powerful and flexible media streaming solution.
author: Smart Code Ltd.

form_fields.label: No CORS (Set to 1 to disable CORS checks)
form_fields.hint: If you're running stremio-web locally, set to 1 to disable CORS checks on the server

form_fields.label: Disable Casting
form_fields.hint: Disable network device discovery and local video players (recommended for Docker)
